review: We have been using Roku's various streaming devices for about 4 years now and have been very satisfied with all of them. We decided to try the "stick" out for the television in the master bedroom of our summer home. The installation was simple and quick with no hick-ups etc. and it was up and running in about 10 minutes. I opted to use the power adapter in order to keep the USB ports available on our Samsung LED television. Most of the time the "stick" is top notch in operation however periodically (twice in a bit more than 2 weeks so far) it requires rebooting (disconnecting its power supply momentarily). Usually the first symptom a reboot is needed is the momentary loss of sound during streaming which for us first appears while streaming video from Hulu and as the symptoms worsen the behavior is also observed while viewing Netflix as well. If the stick is not rebooted the quality continues to worsen and includes flickering and or lines flashing across the picture.
author: Mikwr
